title: IMAX CEO: Much More Demand From Filmmakers for Our Tech
description: Richard Gelfond, IMAX CEO, says 2025 was a record year for the IMAX box office. He speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Richard Gelfond, IMAX CEO, says 2025 was a record year for the IMAX box office. He speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
